name: AlRide RideSharing made Simple
description: Rails application for getting a ride share.

Settings.platform_name.description: Name of the application for your usage

Settings.mail.from.description: Email used to send emails out to participants.

Settings.mail.default_url_options.host.description: The domain to use to send your emails, this can be the heroku domain for now.

Settings.mail.default_url_options.protoc.description: Protocol to use in linkes in emails. Heroku supports https.

Settings.mail.default_url_options.port.description: Port to use in linkes in emails

Settings.secret_key_base.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.
